mapper.select: SELECT g.`name` AS `group`, g.lastUpdate, COUNT(p.sequence) AS post FROM `group` AS g LEFT JOIN collection AS c ON g.id = c.`group` LEFT JOIN picture AS p ON c.cId = p.collection GROUP BY g.id ORDER BY lastUpdate DESC LIMIT #{skip}, #{limit}

SELECT g.`name` AS `group`, g.lastUpdate, COUNT(p.sequence) AS post FROM `group` AS g LEFT JOIN collection AS c ON g.id = c.`group` LEFT JOIN picture AS p ON c.cId = p.collection WHERE g.`name` IN ( SELECT DISTINCT g.`name` FROM `group` AS g LEFT JOIN alias AS a ON g.id = a.origin WHERE (kind = 1 OR kind IS NULL) AND (g.`name` LIKE CONCAT('%', #{query}, '%') OR a.alias LIKE CONCAT('%', #{query}, '%')) ) GROUP BY g.id ORDER BY lastUpdate DESC LIMIT #{skip}, #{limit}
